name: Keep The Lights On (Demo)
description:
Description

Keep the Lights On is an atmospheric horror game that features puzzles and platforming. You step in the shoes of Edmund Rosental, a private detective, who is tasked with investigating an old abbey and mysteries surrounding it. Will you be able to keep the lights on or do you succumb to the darkness?

DEVELOPED BY: LIGHT THE LANTERN STUDIOS

Coming in 2021
